items.manifest:
builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-api
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    workDir: /go/src/github.com/estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    commands:
    - go test `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`
    - CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags "-X main.version=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} -X main.revision=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_REVISION} -X main.branch=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_BRANCH} -X main.buildDate=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_DATETIME}" -o ./publish/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP} .

  bake:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - cp Dockerfile ./publish
    - cp /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt ./publish
    - cp -r ./cockroach/migrations ./publish/
    - docker build -t estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    env:
      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(IXFQ9igip3IH0KVY.N6RTT4RB9dz15UGKHQUBctAf5QNI8G8QYg==)
      DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD: estafette.secret(zhN34B3iKmWis2t-.guUQYqZPjXTjaWK4G6ZU4n-DYyOZvigT2tdRYEP3zQddr4HA)
    commands:
    - docker login --username=${DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME} --password="${DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD}"
    - docker push estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(08UOJSF6Fvdz9u2X.lzsCArDpf97g7i2Vx-3UTyWsxCB81e05jthdY_AI3OffXBA-NurQePraQqzNf-9IhdoDvr1Akg0yom4S2kHjvWLhRC8Y7xgheK8MR6qPu2oi3QvlYbnNtTTOOjMi)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

commits.message: this is a superlong commit message that needs to be truncated in order not to ruin the layout

items.manifest:
builder:
  track: stable

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-builder
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

env:
  GCR_PROJECT: estafette.secret(3tHZ9bT_wEz5K8Cx.kZyD5m8L-7-zpvzZ4bkeyUdKLiGfRx_ttoY=)

stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    workDir: /go/src/github.com/estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    commands:
    - apk --update add git
    - go test `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`
    - CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags "-X main.version=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} -X main.revision=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_REVISION} -X main.branch=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_BRANCH} -X main.buildDate=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_DATETIME}" -o ./publish/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP} .

  bake-estafette:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - cp Dockerfile ./publish
    - docker build -f ./publish/Dockerfile -t estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    env:
      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(mhN5HP5qcUkpSp4m.s9UnvG027LhQjT-bvvyjYcLKtyd_-xY1Cw==)
      DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD: estafette.secret(_oi7CDX50U8qjQSS.U3dzq3cw3J-_-hODYbNtOEDWgeUGzgXk2J0T-WMOmkil56tg)
    commands:
    - docker login --username=${DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME} --password="${DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD}"
    - docker push estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  bake-gocd-agent:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - cp Dockerfile.gocd ./publish
    - docker build -f ./publish/Dockerfile.gocd -t gcr.io/${GCR_PROJECT}/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-gcr-io:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - docker login --username=_json_key --password="$ESTAFETTE_GCR_PASSWORD" https://gcr.io
    - docker push gcr.io/${GCR_PROJECT}/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(VQhyeydGURZSFLmh.zxAW1ZVhI7JqLgr9-K7_YuzSFWAasNFRIHAm9OXj2RK_Wa-FWXt9LCCJuD6K6jz_SYpbEhiBWcjd0VkD23AazyLmz3EsImi2C1AJ82ltxuMmN93rPZbdP3kT5vwa)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-contracts
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

stages:
  set-pending-build-status:
    image: extensions/github-status:dev
    status: pending

  build:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    workDir: /go/src/github.com/estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    commands:
    - go test -v `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`

  tag-revision:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    commands:
    - apk --no-cache add git
    - git tag ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - git push origin ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}

  set-build-status:
    image: extensions/github-status:dev

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(PiUCBMW1LEeyFk3i.vn0sEYGK_QU_tXtxQ7PbQra1L8a-reYGkDbzP9K9A6NzKbsf4CExtahJW7JjViXCtxuRlAt_c4kYF2oBRaCQ_4x3iDWLUp4P7AkchXI9Es4l7eeUWfB3A-Lpy4LG)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-crypt
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:

    minor: 0

    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'

stages:

    workDir: /go/src/github.com/estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    commands:
    - go test -v `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`

  tag-revision:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    commands:
    - apk --no-cache add git
    - git tag ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - git push origin ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(fG4kwm5DOqzVjkqB.3kNhXhStG_Wmf8ZR9fKwTLwbj7RKlLiwE2LFD17GwhEVqe_7Y2m6K-FECC9Exo6A04LbJXGK-MtVEi_2L-MntNNYIz212MxsvHkObll_G3bQ8wZQHg9xOwJAKP3d)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

# selects the dev track for builder in order to dogfood estafette's components
builder:
  track: dev

# these turn into ESTAFETTE_LABEL_... envvars, automatically injected into all pipeline steps
labels:
  app: estafette-ci-manifest
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

# generates a 0.0.x-<branch> version made available as ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION envvar, automatically injected into all pipeline steps
version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 1
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

# global environments variables that are automatically injected into all pipeline steps and can be overridden by defining an envvar in a pipeline step with the same name
env:
  VAR1: somevalue
  VAR2: another value

# pipeline steps to be executed sequentially; for each step the 'when' is evaluated to see whether it should be executed or skipped
stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    workDir: /go/src/github.com/estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    commands:
    - go test -v `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`

  tag-revision:
    image: golang:1.10.2-alpine3.7
    commands:
    - apk --no-cache add git
    - git tag ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - git push origin ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(PiUCBMW1LEeyFk3i.vn0sEYGK_QU_tXtxQ7PbQra1L8a-reYGkDbzP9K9A6NzKbsf4CExtahJW7JjViXCtxuRlAt_c4kYF2oBRaCQ_4x3iDWLUp4P7AkchXI9Es4l7eeUWfB3A-Lpy4LG)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-web
  team: estafette-team
  language: node

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

env:
  GCR_PROJECT: estafette.secret(3tHZ9bT_wEz5K8Cx.kZyD5m8L-7-zpvzZ4bkeyUdKLiGfRx_ttoY=)

stages:
  build:
    image: node:10.1.0-alpine
    commands:
    - npm install
    - npm install -g ember-cli@3.1.3
    - ember build --environment production

  bake:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - mkdir publish
    - cp -r dist publish
    - cp nginx.vh.default.conf ./publish
    - cp Dockerfile ./publish
    - docker build -f ./publish/Dockerfile -t estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    env:
      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(mhN5HP5qcUkpSp4m.s9UnvG027LhQjT-bvvyjYcLKtyd_-xY1Cw==)
      DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD: estafette.secret(_oi7CDX50U8qjQSS.U3dzq3cw3J-_-hODYbNtOEDWgeUGzgXk2J0T-WMOmkil56tg)
    commands:
    - docker login --username=${DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME} --password="${DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD}"
    - docker push estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(VQhyeydGURZSFLmh.zxAW1ZVhI7JqLgr9-K7_YuzSFWAasNFRIHAm9OXj2RK_Wa-FWXt9LCCJuD6K6jz_SYpbEhiBWcjd0VkD23AazyLmz3EsImi2C1AJ82ltxuMmN93rPZbdP3kT5vwa)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

    - CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags "-X main.version=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} -X main.revision=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_REVISION} -X main.branch=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_BRANCH} -X main.buildDate=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_DATETIME}" -o ./publish/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP} .

  bake:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:

    - cp /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt ./publish
    - docker build -t extensions/slack-build-status:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce

      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(3Yi-UBRrdx87H4RP.O7dg2KedDdxlgUiGrL5y040NWyRIf7X7bw==)

    - docker push extensions/slack-build-status:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - docker tag extensions/slack-build-status:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    - docker push extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:stable
